featured.text: You can be an everyday Jane Doe or John Smith while awake but a superhero while sleeping, 30 who you are in real life.

definition.zh_def: 擁有超能力或特異技能，並致力於保護他人或打擊罪惡的人物。
definition.en_def: A character with superhuman abilities or extraordinary skills who is dedicated to protecting others or fighting evil.
definition.example: Spider-Man is a popular superhero known for his agility and web-slinging abilities.
